function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of B&K multigas photoacoustic analyzers for measuring SF6 concentration","Impact":"Inaccurate measurements can lead to incorrect assessment of indoor air quality and potential health risks","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and cross-validation with other measurement methods such as gas chromatography","Technologies":"Gas chromatography, calibration standards","People":"Occupants of the houses, research team","Owner":"Research team, instrument manufacturer"},{"Description":"Potential cross-contamination between houses","Impact":"May lead to erroneous assessment of the spread of SF6 and other contaminants","Mitigation":"Implement strict protocols for equipment cleaning and sample collection","Technologies":"Cleaning agents, protocols for sample collection and handling","People":"Research team, laboratory staff","Owner":"Research team, laboratory facility"},{"Description":"Inaccurate measurement of air change rate","Impact":"Incorrect assessment of ventilation efficiency and potential buildup of contaminants","Mitigation":"Use of multiple measurement techniques and validation with tracer gas methods","Technologies":"Tracer gas methods, ventilation measurement tools","People":"Occupants of the houses, research team","Owner":"Research team, building facility management"}]}
